RT Tickets Resolved/Code Changes For ZMap 0.1.117

Last Release Date: 08/03/2011

Current Release Date: 11 March 2011

This report covers 2011-03-08 to 2011-03-11

Request Tracker Tickets Resolved


zmap
  • Ticket No.207002, Resolved (Wed Mar 09 08:35:34 2011)

    rev comp coordinates

    jm12@sanger.ac.uk


Code Changes From CVS/GIT Repositories


ZMap Changes/Fixes [from cvs]
  • Browse CVS
  • src/zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowSequenceFeature.c: fix by a bit of a hack bug whereby we fall off the end of dna when clicking at end of peptide sequence.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindow.c: fix bug in dna/peptide coord display when revcomp'd + improve mouse debug messages.
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapWebPages.h: update release notes file to release_notes.2011_03_08.shtml
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapUtils_P.h: /var/tmp/zmap.12520/ZMap/scripts/versioner run by zmap
  • src/zmapView/zmapViewRemoteReceive.c: window mark calls were wrong way round, one is position, other is user coords.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowMark.c: remove function that should be in window, not in windowmark.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowUtils.c: add call to return mark in user coords (negative as in acedb etc.).

Aceb Changes/Fixes [from cvs]
  • Browse CVS

Seqtools Changes/Fixes [from git]
  • Browse CVS
  • Fixed an issue where Dotter was overwriting the primary clipboard on startup
  • This was because the top spin button in the greyramp tool was focused by default and its text was selected.
  • Allow user to change the active reading frame by clicking a tree header
  • Turned warnings on in default compiler options in runconfig
  • Fixed compiler warnings
